GSD.description:
scsi: scsi_debug: Fix type in min_t to avoid stack OOB

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.11 by commit 3085147645938eb41f0bc0e25ef9791e71f5ee4b. For more details please see the references link.
